TEXT: A clockwork toy who assembled themself from nothing but junk. NL Winds up to charge to their full power.
NL You wind your winder as far as it goes...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~mechanical~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
